metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7585 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
In libsndfile before 1.0.28, an error in the "flac_buffer_copy()" function (flac.c) can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted FLAC file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7585` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-7ubuntu2.2').
